concept.title: 236.602-1 SELECTION CRITERIA.

conbody.p: (a) Establish the evaluation criteria before making the public announcement required by FAR 5.205(d) and include the criteria and their relative order of importance in the announcement. Follow the procedures at PGI 236.602-1(a).
